"Ok Preborn" said Attilla "Let's go to see Shivah, i can bet that I know wh=
ere's he right now"

Attilla walked and he invited Preborn to follow him


=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 3:38 AM
  Subject: Re: It's Showtime
=


  Prebons face nearly turned to shock. this bot seemed like it was comple=
tely oblivious to the name Prebon. His very name was spoken with honor for =
being the Trainer of some of the most successfull units in the Predacon arm=
y. "My name is Prebon, remember it with respect and dignity." this bot obvi=
ously needed to be taught some order. Prebon began to wonder if that is why=
 he had been selected to transfer to this out of the way rock in the univer=
se.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: airly2000@... 
    To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:23 PM
    Subje=
ct: RE: It's Showtime


    Attilla:

    "Don't press your luck, dwarf" sa=
id inside his mind the male and told to Preborn with the same tone "Follow =
me... with whom I have the honor?"
      ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, =
May 29, 2001 3:15 AM
      Subject: Re: It's Showtime


      Prebon looked=
 over Attilla, the oposite bot was slightly taller and more armored than hi=
mself, The former Trainer leader always tried to size up a possible opponen=
t before a fight. "Very well" he said crossing his arms tightly in a peturb=
ed fashion, "Then I will ask Shivah about how I AM to be treated." His arms=
 went to his sides and he turned towards the door. "If you would be so cons=
iderate as to introduce us I would be greatfull" He continued in mock court=
esy making a request sound like an order.
        ----- Original Message --=
--- 
        From: airly2000@... 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

        Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 9:13 AM
        Subject: RE: It's Showt=
ime


        Attilla:

        "Nope, it isn't the way " answered  Attilla=
 "What do you think if Shivah solve this trouble... He can explain you what=
 happened Ok?"
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBE=
RWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, May 2=
8, 2001 10:46 AM
          Subject: Re: It's Showtime


          Prebon st=
epped out, his memories were either gone or distorted but his leadership pr=
ograms were still intact. He remembered how roughly he was treated and how =
he was slammed into the CR chamber. To top it off he was always cranky when=
 he woke up. "What is the meaning of this travesty?" he yelled. He saw Pred=
acon emblem on Attilla so he knew thought he wasn't a POW. "Is this any way=
 to treat one of the Predacons best training units?" his record of service =
would have spoke for itself if he hadn't erased it when he left the Predaco=
ns to start his own unit.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
     From: airly2000@... 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   =
         Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 10:01 PM
            Subject: RE: It's =
Showtime


            Attilla:

            "Memories erased, reprogramati=
on ended"thought Attilla "This guy is ready to start duties."

            =
Attilla typed some buttons and watied to Cr's door 0pen, "Hey, Hello"

    =
        The bot was ready to fight just in case.

roups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
